Text:
Sorry dude, but could you please help me out here. 
All that stuff with the "terminal" app is just to tech for me. I know I am a noob but since this software could help me so much with my examen i would love some help. 
Should i install maple before or after i run the "terminal" thing? and please spell out in capitals how i do that "terminal thing" lol thanks

i actually installed maple 16 but get confused when we have to move the licence file and the lib maple file! i was wondering when do we actually move it? before or after installation? and where exactly? also also i am being told that invalid licence! 
anyone please could you guide me step by step? please!

Thanks a lot for sharing!

& for the other commenter:
/Library/Frameworks/Maple.framework/Versions/14/license is where license file goes after installation for Maple 14 before one can use it.

You move the files after it is installed, but before opening it. @purpleninja, i dont know what terminal stuff youre talking about, could you clarify? because after working well for several days, it has now discovered my license isn't valid, and will not work.
Hey I just downloaded this but I'm not sure how to use it. I tried installing it but it's asking for a purchase code which I don't have. Can someone help me out? Thank you in advance. :)
